paragraphs.text:
%sh
cat <<EOF | ssh -F /dev/null -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" -i ~/.ssh/id_localhost ec2-user@172.17.0.1 bash
    whoami
EOF

%sh
cat <<EOF | ssh -F /dev/null -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" -i ~/.ssh/id_localhost ec2-user@172.17.0.1 bash
    ls wrk/dotfiles
    cd wrk/dotfiles
    bash tools/anyenv.bash
EOF

msg.data:
Makefile
setup.bash
tools
fatal: destination path '/home/ec2-user/.anyenv' already exists and is not an empty directory.

paragraphs.text:
%sh
cat <<EOF | ssh -F /dev/null -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" -i ~/.ssh/id_localhost ec2-user@172.17.0.1 bash
    anyenv --version
EOF

%sh
cat <<EOF | ssh -F /dev/null -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" -i ~/.ssh/id_localhost ec2-user@172.17.0.1 bash
    anyenv install pyenv
EOF

    pyenv --version
EOF

%sh
cat <<EOF | ssh -F /dev/null -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" -i ~/.ssh/id_localhost ec2-user@172.17.0.1 bash
    pyenv install -k 3.6
EOF

msg.data:
python-build: definition not found: 3.6

The following versions contain `3.6' in the name:
  3.3.6
  3.6.0
  3.6-dev
  3.6.1
  3.6.2
  3.6.3
  3.6.4
  3.6.5
  3.6.6rc1
  activepython-3.6.0

See all available versions with `pyenv install --list'.

If the version you need is missing, try upgrading pyenv:

  cd /home/ec2-user/.anyenv/envs/pyenv/plugins/python-build/../.. && git pull && cd -

paragraphs.text:
%sh
cat <<EOF | ssh -F /dev/null -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" -i ~/.ssh/id_localhost ec2-user@172.17.0.1 bash
    sudo yum update -y && sudo yum install -y gcc openssl-devel zlib-devel
    pyenv install -k 3.6.5
EOF

paragraphs.text:
%sh
cat <<EOF | ssh -F /dev/null -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" -i ~/.ssh/id_localhost ec2-user@172.17.0.1 bash
    which python
EOF

%sh
cat <<EOF | ssh -F /dev/null -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" -i ~/.ssh/id_localhost ec2-user@172.17.0.1 bash
    mkdir -p tmp
    cd tmp
    echo 3.6.5 > .python-version
    python --version
EOF

    anyenv install ndenv
EOF
